co.lqnt.lockbox

Interface DecryptionCipherInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CipherInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cipher, DecryptionCipher

    public interface DecryptionCipherInterface
    The interface implemented by Lockbox decryption ciphers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] decrypt(PrivateKeyInterface key, byte[] data)
      Decrypt a data packet.
      String decrypt(PrivateKeyInterface key, String data)
      Decrypt a data packet.

    • Method Detail

      • decrypt

        byte[] decrypt(PrivateKeyInterface key,
             byte[] data)
               throws DecryptionFailedException
        Decrypt a data packet.
        Parameters:
        key - They key to decrypt with.
        data - The data to decrypt.
        Returns:
        The decrypted data.
        Throws:
        DecryptionFailedException - If the decryption failed.
